results.name: If A010060(n) = 1, a(n) = A065621(A115384(n)), otherwise a(n) = A048724(a(floor(n/2))).
comment: a(n) gives the number that is in the same position in array A277820 as where n is located in array A277880.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16383
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: If A010060(n) = 1 [when n is one of the odious numbers, A000069], then a(n) = A065621(A115384(n)), otherwise a(n) = A048724(a(floor(n/2))).
As a composition of other permutations:
A010060(a(n)) = A010060(n). [Preserves the parity of binary weight.]
